content: Total revenue in the third quarter reached $916 million, comparable sales grew more than 34% versus the prior year boosted by higher guest volumes and market share gains throughout the Arcosâ footprint. Digital sales in NOLAD grew around 200% versus the prior year quarter, aided by the continuous improvements in each marketâs Mobile App functionality, including Mobile Order and Pay, as well as greater marketing investments to promote the Digital platform. In the third quarter, we also set new records in Self-order Kiosks sales, which were available in more than 900 ELTF restaurants, Mobile Order and Pay sales supported by enhance functionality, and it rolled out to a growing number of markets, and sales generated through the Mobile App, which has been downloaded almost 80 million times and is the main digital communication platform with guests. Meanwhile, on- premise traffic has improved steadily since 2020, which contributed to a moderation in Drive-Thru traffic growth this year, month delivery volume and total sales are both up this year, driving 29% sales growth in Brazil, despite a relatively flat industry trend.
